phrs.translation: 承租人, 租户, 承批人
房客, 佃户, 租户

sentences.sentence: This is nonrefundable, even if the source of the mineral is less prevalent than the lessee predicted it to be or if it is in an unextractable form.
sentences.translation: 即使矿源比承租人预测的要少，或者矿源是不可开采的形式，这也是不可退还的。

sentences.sentence: Once the commodity rights are leased, the lessee will issue the owner an up-front payment to explore the property and investigate possible ways to extract the commodity.
sentences.translation: 一旦商品权利被出租，承租人将向所有人支付一笔预付款，用于勘探财产并调查提取商品的可能方式。

sentences.sentence: Payment of all building and land taxes shall be borne solely by the Lessee.
sentences.translation: 一切房屋、土地税均由承租方承担。
